data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 2, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Facundo Waller gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, Pachuca have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 8, Pumas UNAM take a 0-1 lead thanks to Favio Alvarez.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Favio Alvarez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 11, Pachuca pushes forward through Roberto Nurse, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 14, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 16, Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 18, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 19, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Erik Lira (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca's Erick Aguirre is caught offside.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Juan Dinenno for Pumas UNAM has been booked by Eduardo Galvan Basulto and receives a first yellow card.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Pachuca de Soto to check on Oscar Murillo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 29, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pachuca just outside Pumas UNAM's area.
Pachuca's Oscar Murillo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 31, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Pachuca throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Pachuca are caught offside.
In the minute 35, Pumas UNAM advance rapidly upfield but Eduardo Galvan Basulto blows for offside.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 40, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 43, Pachuca have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
Pachuca have been awarded a penalty in Pachuca de Soto...
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Pachuca are awarded a penalty at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. Victor Guzman takes the kick ... But misses!
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Pachuca.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo, Pachuca are penalized for being offside.
The first-half is over at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca's Victor Guzman misses with an attempt on goal.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 51, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Pumas UNAM territory.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 55, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Pachuca a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Pachuca are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 62, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto blows against Pachuca's Felipe Pardo for offside.
The home team replace Erick Sanchez with Emmanuel Garcia.
Roberto de la Rosa is replacing Roberto Nurse for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 63, Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a third substitution, with Victor Davila replacing Victor Guzman.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Pumas UNAM make their first substitution with Carlos Gutierrez replacing Facundo Waller.
Andres Iniestra is replacing Juan Dinenno for the away team.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 70, Free kick Pachuca.
Pumas UNAM's Carlos Gutierrez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Pachuca defender.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pachuca are in shooting range from this free kick.
Alejandro Mayorga (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 74, Favio Alvarez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The away team has substituted Favio Alvarez with Juan Iturbe. Andres Lillini is thus making his third change.
In the minute 77, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
In the minute 79, Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Pachuca are whistled for offside.
The home team have replaced Felipe Pardo with Antonio Figueroa. This is the fourth substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 82, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Pachuca throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Antonio Figueroa. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Roberto de la Rosa for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In Pachuca de Soto, Pumas UNAM push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Juan Iturbe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
